name: unregisterAllPushDevices
description: Unregisters devices. All their subscriptions for receiving push notifications through channels will also be deleted.

deviceId.description: Optional filter to restrict to devices associated with that deviceId. Cannot be used with clientId.

clientId.description: Optional filter to restrict to devices associated with that clientId. Cannot be used with deviceId.

X-Ably-Version.description: The version of the API you wish to use.

format.description: The response format you would like

$ul: **serverId**: Server ID with which error was encountered.
